NoteInfo: Additional information to be displayed for the mod
GlobalTagsInfo: Tags all players will see in Skyve
SavesCantLoadWithoutIt: Οι αποθηκεύσεις δεν μπορούν να φορτωθούν χωρίς αυτό
SourceCodeNotAvailable: Ο πηγαίος κώδικας δεν είναι διαθέσιμος
MusicCanBeCopyrighted: Η συμπεριλαμβανόμενη μουσική μπορεί να είναι πνευματική ιδιοκτησία
ConfirmEndSession: Είστε βέβαιοι ότι θέλετε να ολοκληρώσετε τη συνεδρία σας?
CrDataLoadFailed: Αποτυχία φόρτωσης δεδομένων, προσπαθήστε ξανά αργότερα
ReuseData_Tip:
Re-uses the compatibility data from your last saved package for this one.
Hold Shift to also apply & continue
PleaseReviewTheStability: Παρακαλούμε εξετάστε τη σταθερότητα αυτού του πακέτου πριν την αποθήκευση.
PleaseReviewPackageStatuses:
Please review the statuses of this package before saving.
Some have an invalid Status Type.
PleaseReviewPackageInteractions:
Please review the interactions of this package before saving.
Some have an invalid Interaction Type or don't have a linked package.
PleaseReviewPackageUsage: Παρακαλώ επιλέξτε μια έγκυρη χρήση για αυτό το πακέτο.

Interaction_Alternative.One: '{1}' μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως εναλλακτική λύση για το '{0}'.
Interaction_Alternative.Plural: Any one of the following packages can be used as an alternative to '{0}'.

Interaction_SameFunctionality.Plural: '{0}' και τα ακόλουθα πακέτα έχουν τις ίδιες λειτουργίες.

Interaction_IncompatibleWith.One: '{0}' και '{1}' δεν είναι συμβατά μεταξύ τους.
Interaction_IncompatibleWith.Plural: '{0}' δεν είναι συμβατό με κανένα από τα ακόλουθα πακέτα.

Interaction_CausesIssuesWith.One: '{0}' μπορεί να προκαλέσει προβλήματα όταν χρησιμοποιείται με '{1}'.
Interaction_CausesIssuesWith.Plural: '{0}' μπορεί να προκαλέσει προβλήματα όταν χρησιμοποιείται με τα ακόλουθα mods.

Interaction_RequiredPackages.One: You're missing a required package for '{0}'.
Interaction_RequiredPackages.Plural: Λείπει τα ακόλουθα απαιτούμενα πακέτα για το '{0}'.

Interaction_OptionalPackages.One: You're missing an optional package for '{0}'.
Interaction_OptionalPackages.Plural: Λείπει τα ακόλουθα προαιρετικά πακέτα για το '{0}'.

Interaction_SucceededBy.Plural: '{0}' πετυχαίνει ένα από τα ακόλουθα πακέτα.

Interaction_LoadAfter.Plural: '{0}' θα φορτώσει αμέσως μετά τα ακόλουθα πακέτα.

Interaction_RequiredItem.Plural: '{0}' is required for the following packages.

Interaction_Identical:
The following are multiple versions of the same mod.
Using them at the same time will cause conflicts.
Status_Succeeded: '{0}' is succeeded by '{1}', and you are already using '{1}'. There is no need for '{0}' anymore.
Status_Deprecated: '{0}' έχει καταργηθεί, δεν υποστηρίζεται πλέον από το συγγραφέα του.
Status_AutoDeprecated: '{0}' δεν έχει ενημερωθεί εδώ και πολύ καιρό.

Status_Reupload.Zero: '{0}' είναι μια εκ νέου αποστολή ενός αρχικού πακέτου.

Status_CausesIssues: '{0}' is known to cause issues with the game.

Status_SavesCantLoadWithoutIt.Zero: After saving your city with '{0}' enabled, you will no longer be able to load that save without '{0}' enabled.
Status_SavesCantLoadWithoutIt.One:
After saving your city with '{0}' enabled, you will no longer be able to load that save without '{0}' enabled.

Use '{1}' to recover your save if needed. Read its Workshop description for more info.

Status_TestVersion.Zero: Αυτή είναι μια "Δοκιμή" έκδοση, γνωρίζετε ότι οι δοκιμαστικές εκδόσεις των mods μπορούν να προκαλέσουν προβλήματα και ότι οι ενημερώσεις σε αυτό μπορεί να προκαλέσουν απροσδόκητα σφάλματα.
Status_TestVersion.One:
This is a 'Test' version of '{1}'.
Be aware that updates to it might cause unexpected issues.

Status_MissingDlc.One: Σας λείπει ένα DLC για να χρησιμοποιήσετε αυτό το πακέτο.
Status_MissingDlc.Plural: Δεν έχετε τα ακόλουθα DLC για να χρησιμοποιήσετε αυτό το πακέτο.

Status_DependencyMod: This is a dependency mod, but it does not look like you are using any package that requires it.
Status_SourceCodeNotAvailable: Ο πηγαίος κώδικας αυτού του mod δεν είναι διαθέσιμος. Δεν πρέπει να τον χρησιμοποιείτε, εκτός αν εμπιστεύεστε το συγγραφέα του.
Status_MusicCanBeCopyrighted: Η μουσική μέσα σε αυτό το πακέτο μπορεί να είναι πνευματικά δικαιώματα. Είναι καλύτερο να μην το χρησιμοποιήσετε κατά τη ροή.
Status_IncompleteDescription: Η περιγραφή του εργαστηρίου αυτού του mod είναι πολύ μικρή. Δεν πρέπει να το χρησιμοποιήσετε εκτός αν εμπιστεύεστε τον συντάκτη του.
Status_SourceAvailable: Αυτό το πακέτο δεν θα προειδοποιήσει για τον πηγαίο κώδικα που λείπει.
Status_StandardMod: Αυτό το πακέτο θα αγνοηθεί κατά την επεξεργασία των mods για αντιμετώπιση προβλημάτων.
Stability_AssetNotReviewed:
'{0}' has not been reviewed yet.
The compatibility information may not be accurate; though assets are generally stable.
Stability_NotReviewed:
'{0}' has not been reviewed yet.
The compatibility information may not be accurate.
Stability_Stable: '{0}' is stable. Its author is still actively working on it and updating it.
Stability_StableNoNewFeatures:
'{0}' is stable, though the author will no longer release feature updates.
They will however still update it in case of new bugs.
Stability_StableNoFutureUpdates: '{0}' is stable, though the author is no longer supporting it, future updates or bug fixes are unlikely.
Stability_HasIssuesNoFutureUpdates: '{0}' can cause issues, and the author is no longer supporting it, future updates or bug fixes are unlikely.
Stability_BreaksOnPatch: '{0}' is very likely to break when the new patch is released.
Stability_NotEnoughInformation: There is not enough information to properly review '{0}'.
Stability_HasIssues:
'{0}' can cause issues.
Be careful while using it.
Stability_Broken:
'{0}' is broken.
It is known to either break the game or just does not work.
Stability_Incompatible:
'{0}' is marked as not compatible with your current game version.
Use it cautiously, or disable it while waiting for it to be updated.
Stability_AssetIncompatible:
'{0}' is marked as not compatible with your current game version.
Assets rarely break with new updates, so you should be okay using it.
Stability_Local:
This is a local version of the '{0}' mod.

While local versions are usually used for testing purposes, it is not recommended to stay on the local version of a mod.
Stability_BrokenFromNewVersion:
'{1}' broke after its latest update{0}. Please wait until it is updated before using it.
In the meantime, you should disable it.
Stability_BrokenFromNewVersionSafe: '{1}' broke after its latest update{0}. Please wait until it is updated before using it.
Stability_BrokenFromPatch:
'{1}' broke after patch {0} of the game. Please wait until it is updated before using it.
In the meantime, you should disable it.
Stability_BrokenFromPatchSafe: '{1}' broke after patch {0} of the game. Please wait until it is updated before using it.
Stability_BrokenFromPatchUpdated: '{1}' broke after patch {0} of the game. But was recently updated, it might be safe to use.
Stability_NumerousReports: There are multiple active reports for '{0}' at the moment. Caution is advised while the issue is being investigated.
Stability_Obsolete: '{0}' is obsolete, its usage is no longer needed, or is redundant due to the game or other mods having the same functionality.
Action_IncludeThis: You should add '{0}' to your playset

Action_IncludeOther.One: You should add '{1}' to your playset.
Action_IncludeOther.Plural: You should add the following packages to your playset.

Action_SelectOne.One: Μεταξύ '{0}' και '{1}', θα πρέπει να επιλέξετε μόνο ένα από αυτά.
Action_SelectOne.Plural: Μεταξύ του '{0}' και των παρακάτω πακέτων, θα πρέπει να επιλέξετε μόνο ένα.

Action_UnsubscribeThis: You should completely remove '{0}' from all your playsets.

Action_UnsubscribeOther.One: You should completely remove '{1}' from all your playsets.
Action_UnsubscribeOther.Plural: You should completely remove the following packages from all your playsets.

Action_ExcludeThis: You should remove '{0}' from your playset.

Action_ExcludeOther.One: You should remove '{1}' from your playset.
Action_ExcludeOther.Plural: You should remove the following packages from your playset.

Action_DisableOther.Plural: You should disable the following packages.

Action_Switch.Plural: You should switch to one of the following packages.

RequestReviewInfo: Είσαι αντιμετωπίζετε προβλήματα με αυτό το πακέτο?
UnsubscribeCount: {0} {1} από το οποίο θα πρέπει να διαγραφείτε

RequiredItemCount.One: {0} {1} that is required but is not enabled
RequiredItemCount.Plural: {0} {1} that are required but are not enabled

PackageType_MusicPack: Music pack for the in-game radio.
PackageType_ContentPackage: Content package that contains assets or files, such as models, textures, or prefabs, and does not include any code or scripts that modify game behavior.
PackageType_VisualMod: Visual / UI modifications mod, or map & theme textures.
PackageType_SimulationMod: Simulation mod that directly alters the gameplay of the game.
PackageType_NameList: Extra game translations or name-list files.
ApplyChangedBeforeExit:
Έχετε μη αποθηκευμένες αλλαγές.

Θα θέλατε να εφαρμόσετε αυτές τις αλλαγές πριν συνεχίσετε?
AuthorRetired:
The author of {0}, {1}, has retired or has been inactive for a long time.

Future updates & stability for their packages is not guaranteed.
AuthorMalicious: Ο συγγραφέας του {0}, {1}, είναι γνωστό ότι είναι κακόβουλο και/ή για τη συμπερίληψη επιβλαβούς περιεχομένου όπως οι ιοί στα πακέτα τους.
RequestReviewDisclaimer: *Your account's ID and logs are sent with your request

OtherCompatibilityWarnings.One: This package has one other compatibility warning
OtherCompatibilityWarnings.Plural: This package has {0} other compatibility warnings

AddMeaningfulNote: Please add a note describing what is wrong with this package.
EditNoteInfo: Leave a note for other managers to see in the future.
RequestReviewUpdate: Send a new request for review.
SavegameEffect_None: This mod is safe to remove.
SavegameEffect_AssetsRemain: Removing assets leaves a grey box where they were placed in your city. These obsolete objects should be cleared to prevent any side effects.
SavegameEffect_EffectsLinger: Removing this mod will not remove its effects from your city.
SavegameEffect_RequiresManualAction: Removing this mod will require additional steps to properly remove it from your city.
SavegameEffect_BreaksSave: Removing this mod will break any city it was used in. Make sure to create backups of your city before using it.
RemovalNoteInfo: Describe the steps to safely remove the mod from a savegame...
ChooseWhatToRequest: Choose how to send your request
ReportIssueDesc:
Let us and other players know that there's an issue with this mod.

Or to let us know that you'd like a new review of this mod.
AddInfoDesc:
Add missing compatibility information to the mod.

And explain any issue related to this mod.
SendSavegameInfo: Optionally attach your savegame to help us investigate the issue better
